de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.imc

Class ImcAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.AbstractImAdapter
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.imc.ImcAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMC
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImcAdapterIetfLong

    public class ImcAdapterIetf
extends AbstractImAdapter
implements org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMC, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport
    IMC adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications. Implementing a simple IF-IMC IMC interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImcAdapterIetf

        public ImcAdapterIetf()
        Creates an IMC adapter with default arguments. This constructor is specified to be called to load an IMC from a source. A specific IMC must override this constructor and add its custom arguments. This implementation of the constructor should only be used for testing purpose.

      • ImcAdapterIetf

        public ImcAdapterIetf(ImParameter parameter,
              TnccAdapterFactory tnccFactory,
              ImSessionFactory<ImcSession> sessionFactory,
              ImSessionManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection,ImcSession> sessionManager,
              ImEvaluatorFactory evaluatorFactory,
              ImcConnectionAdapterFactory connectionFactory,
              ImReader<? extends ImMessageContainer> imReader)
        Creates an IMC adapter with the specified arguments. This constructor is especially for inheritance.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the generic IMC parameter
        tnccFactory - the TNCC adapter factory
        sessionFactory - the factory for a connection session
        sessionManager - the session manager
        evaluatorFactory - the factory to instantiate the evaluation system
        connectionFactory - the connection adapter factory
        imReader - the integrity message reader

      • findSessionByConnection

        protected ImcSession findSessionByConnection(org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection connection)
        Finds a session to the given connection, if one exists. If not it creates a new session. Especially important for inheritance.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection
        Returns:
        the session for the connection
